body:
Hi Mostapha! I was also trying to run this component and it seems I have the same problem as Helena: 1. Solution exception:No se pudo encontrar el archivo 'C:\Users\Elsa\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug\skylib\CIESkies\MADRID_ESP\CIE_sunnyWSun_sky_6_21@1200_radAnalysis_skyView.irr'.

I attach the GH file as well as an screenshot with the folder, in which there isn't any file named as "CIE_sunnyWSun_sky_6_21@1200_radAnalysis_skyView.irr". Do you have any idea :S? I have tried this file in other computer and it worked out :S Thanks a lot in advance!!
